AutoLockHotbar / Description.message: Automatically locks action bars when certain conditions are met.

ChatTweaks@HideChatPanelButtons / Descri.message: Hide the chat log name and close button on panels that have been split from the main window.

ChatTweaks@ImprovedFontSizes / Descripti.message: Allows you to change the font size for the chat windows beyond the default limits, and allows docked chat tabs to keep their font size separate from the main tab.

ChatTweaks@PrintSearchComment / Descript.message: Prints the Search Comment of people, that get inspected, into the chat.

Sets the chat channel when you use temporary chat messages.
Example: "/p hello!" will set the chat channel to Party

ChrDirCommand / Description.message: Adds a command to open the directory when client side character data is stored.

ClickableAlarm / Description.message: Allows clicking the alarm icon in the server bar to open the alarm window.

CombatMovementControl / Description.message: Set movement type between Standard and Legacy when in/out of combat or when weapon is drawn/sheathed.

Add list of command alias. Do not start command with the '/'
These aliases, by design, do not work with macros.

[CommandAlias] Command Alias - Add list of command alias. Do not start command with the '/'
These aliases, by design, do not work with macros.

CommandAlias / MacroHelp.message:
Aliases are not supported in macros to prevent them from being sent to the server in the event you back them up on server.
Please use the original command in your macros.

ExtendedMacroIcon / Description.message: Allow using specific Icon IDs when using '/macroicon # id' inside of a macro.

FixedShadowDistance / Description.message: Sets a fixed value for the shadow rendering, preventing it from changing when flying.

HideHotbarLock / Description.message: Hides the hotbar lock button, with an option to make it visible while holding SHIFT.

HideMouseAfterInactivity / Description.message: Hides the mouse cursor after a period of inactivity like video players do.

HighResScreenshots / Description.message: Allows taking higher resolution screenshots, Hiding Dalamud & Game UIs and removing the copyright notice from screenshots.

HouseLightCommand / Description.message: Adds a command to control lighting in your own housing areas.

ImprovedCraftingLog / Description.message: Modifies the Synthesize button in the Crafting Log to switch job or stand up from the crafting position, allowing you to stop crafting without closing the crafting log.

ImprovedSentMessageHistory / Description.message: Recover messages after accidentally pressing up in the chat, and increase the amount of history retained.

IncreaseChatBubbleLines / Description.message: Allow upto 7 lines of text to be displayed in chat bubbles.

IncreaseChatBubbleLines / Name.message: Increase max line count in chat bubbles

KeepOpen / Description.message: Prevents certain windows from hiding under specific circumstances.

KeyInterrupt / Description.message: Block Alt-Tab and other keys to keep you in the game.

LeaveDutyCommand / Description.message: Adds a command to leave the current duty.

LegacyCameraLock / Description.message: Prevents camera rotation when using Legacy movement type.

LevelingDungeonCommand / Description.message: Adds a command to open the highest level leveling dungeon available for your level.

LongVeil / Description.message: Replaces the wedding veils with their long variants that are usually only shown in the sanctum of the twelve.

MinionAway / Description.message: Adds a command to dismiss your current minion. /minionaway

MoveCutsceneTalk / Description.message: Allows setting a custom position for dialogue boxes used in cutscenes.

NoCharacterNotFoundWarning / Description.message: Prevent the game from displaying the "The character you last logged out with could not be found on the current data center." message.

NoSellList / Description.message: Allows you to define a list of items that can not be sold to a vendor.

OpenEstateAccess / Description.message: Adds a command to open the estate access configuration for the current estate.

PhantomJobCommand / Description.message: Adds a command to switch phantom jobs within Occult Crescent

PidCommand / Description.message: Adds the command '/pid' to show current process id.

QuickSellItems / Description.message: Hold a modifier key to sell items from your inventory in one click.

RefreshMarketPrices / Description.message: Retries to get prices upon receiving the 'Please wait and try your search again' message

RememberQuickGathering / Description.message: Remembers quick gathering status even after gathering at unspoiled nodes.

RememberSelectedWorld / Description.message: Remembers which world was selected for each datacentre.

RemoveClientLimit / Description.message: Allows opening more than the standard two FFXIV clients.

SanctuarySprintReplacer / Description.message: Replaces the normal Sprint action with Isle Sprint while in the Island Sanctuary.

ScreenshotFileName / Description.message: Change the file name format for screenshots.

SearchableFriendList / Description.message: Adds a search bar to the friend list.

SetOptionCommand / Description.message: Adds commands to change various settings.

Intelligently switches keyboard controls between strafing and turning.

UiAdjustments@RemoveQuestMarkerLimit / D.message: Allow the map and minimap to display markers for more than 5 active quests.

UiAdjustments@ResizeExperienceBar / Desc.message: Changes the horizontal scale of the experience bar without affecting the text scale.
